content: The caption for the button used to login into the space with the Single Sign-On service

comment.text: The CustomEntryTooltip translation key is used to display a tooltip message that describes the purpose of the custom entry button in the Single Sign-On service, providing users with an explanation when hovering over or focusing on the button. This tooltip appears above a button for logging into a space using Single Sign-On. Translators should provide a clear and concise description that accurately reflects this functionality.

usage.context:
<SsoFormField
 labelText={t("CustomEntryButton")}
 name="spLoginLabel"
 placeholder={t("Settings:SingleSignOn")}
 tabIndex={4}
 tooltipContent={<Text fontSize="12px">{t("CustomEntryTooltip")}</Text>}
 tooltipClass="custom-entry-tooltip icon-button"
 value={spLoginLabel}
 hasError={spLoginLabelHasError}
 />

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and verbose. The English content describes the *purpose* of the tooltip, while the Arabic translation simply states what the caption *is*. A more natural translation would focus on the function of the button.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: تسجيل الدخول الموحد

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'تسجيل الدخول الموحد' can be more concisely written as 'تسجيل الدخول الأحادي'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: تسجيل الدخول الأحادي

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Birdəfəlik Giriş xidməti ilə domenə daxil olmaq üçün istifadə edilən düymənin adı' is a very literal and verbose translation of 'The caption for the button used to login into the space with the Single Sign-On service'. It's not natural-sounding Azerbaijani. The term 'domenə daxil olmaq' is technically correct but less common and a bit clunky in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tək Giriş Xidməti ilə giriş düyməsi (Single Sign-On button caption)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is very long. While not inherently incorrect, longer translations can be difficult to display properly in user interfaces.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider shortening the translation as much as possible while preserving meaning.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Надписът за бутона, използван за вписване в пространството с услугата за единично вписване" is a bit literal and could be more natural. 'Вписване' can feel a bit formal in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Надписът за бутона за вход в пространството чрез Single Sign-On

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, including the English term 'Single Sign-On' can improve clarity, especially if the target audience may be familiar with the English term. Consider preserving the original term or providing a brief explanation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Надписът за бутона за вход в пространството чрез Single Sign-On (Единично вписване)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'prostor' can be ambiguous. In this context, 'prostor' translates more accurately to 'workspace' or 'area'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Titulek tlačítka pro přihlášení do pracovního prostoru pomocí služby jednotného přihlášení

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence is a bit long and could be simplified for better readability.  Consider splitting it or rephrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Titulek tlačítka pro přihlášení do pracovního prostoru pomocí jednotného přihlášení.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a slightly verbose phrasing that could be more concise for a tooltip. While grammatically correct, it's a bit long for a tooltip.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Die Beschriftung für den Single Sign-On-Anmeldebutton.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content describes the caption *for* a button. The Greek translation, while technically correct, sounds slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be something along the lines of 'Η λεζάντα του κουμπιού για σύνδεση στον χώρο μέσω της υπηρεσίας ενιαίας σύνδεσης.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Η λεζάντα του κουμπιού για σύνδεση στον χώρο μέσω της υπηρεσίας ενιαίας σύνδεσης

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content describes the caption *for* a button. The Spanish translation literally translates it as 'legend of the button', which is not quite the same meaning. 'Caption' implies a label or text displayed on the button.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Etiqueta del botón utilizado para iniciar sesión en el espacio con el servicio de inicio de sesión único.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content describes the *caption* of a button. The Finnish translation literally translates to 'The caption of the button, which is used to log into the space using the single sign-on service'. While not strictly incorrect, it's a bit verbose and awkward. A more natural Finnish phrasing for a tooltip would be more concise.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kertakirjautumispainikkeen kuvaus

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the phrasing 'jota käytetään tilaan sisäänkirjautumiseen kertakirjautumispalvelun avulla' is quite long. A tooltip should be brief.  Consider breaking this down.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternative phrasing for brevity. For example: 'Sisäänkirjautuminen kertakirjautumisella'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English description mentions 'login into the space', while the French translation uses 'se connecter à l’espace'. While both are acceptable, 'se connecter dans l’espace' might be slightly more natural in French.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Légende du bouton utilisé pour se connecter dans l’espace avec le service d’authentification unique (Single Sign-On)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Կոճակի վերնագիր, որն օգտագործվում է Single Sign-On ծառայության միջոցով տարածք մուտք գործելու համար' is a bit verbose and literal. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Մուտքագրման համար Single Sign-On ծառայության կոճակ' or 'Single Sign-On մուտքի կոճակ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Մուտքագրման համար Single Sign-On ծառայության կոճակ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content describes the caption *for* a button, while the Italian translation uses 'del pulsante utilizzato per...'. A more direct translation of 'caption' would be 'didascalia del pulsante'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Didascalia del pulsante utilizzato per accedere allo spazio con il servizio Single Sign-On

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and could be more natural. 'The caption for the button used to login...' is cumbersome. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'シングルサインオンサービスでログインするためのボタンのラベル' or 'シングルサインオンサービスを利用してログインするボタンの表示文'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: シングルサインオンサービスでログインするためのボタンのラベル

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and doesn't flow naturally in Korean. "The caption for the button used to login into the space with the Single Sign-On service" is clunky when directly translated.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 싱글 사인온 서비스를 통해 공간에 로그인하는 버튼에 대한 설명

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of "에 대한 설명" (about the description) at the end is somewhat awkward and not common in typical UI text. It's overly explanatory.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 싱글 사인온 서비스를 통해 공간에 로그인하는 버튼 설명

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Single Sign-On service' is translated as 'ການບໍລິການເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບຄັ້ງດຽວ'. While technically correct, a more natural and commonly used term in Lao for Single Sign-On would be 'ການເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບແບບດຽວ' or 'ການຢັ້ງຢືນຕົວຕົນແບບດຽວ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຄຳບັນຍາຍສຳລັບປຸ່ມທີ່ໃຊ້ເພື່ອເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບຊ່ອງດ້ວຍການບໍລິການການເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບແບບດຽວ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ieteiktos' should be 'ieteikties'. 'Ieteiktos' is in the plural form but the context needs a singular form.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ieteikties

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Het bijschrift voor de knop die wordt gebruikt om in te loggen in de ruimte met de Single Sign-On dienst' is a bit verbose and doesn't fully capture the brevity of the English equivalent. 'Bijschrift' is not the most natural word choice for a button caption.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Een kortere formulering zou beter passen. Bijvoorbeeld: 'Onderschrift voor de Single Sign-On inlogknop' of 'Tekst voor de Single Sign-On inlogknop'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the phrasing 'die wordt gebruikt' is slightly awkward. A more direct approach would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'die wordt gebruikt' with a more concise construction like 'voor'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'służącego do logowania się' is a bit clunky.  A more natural phrasing would be 'umożliwiającego logowanie się'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Podpis dla przycisku umożliwiającego logowanie się w obszarze roboczym za pomocą usługi pojedynczego logowania

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content describes the caption for a login button, while the Portuguese translation refers to "aceder ao espaço" which implies accessing a space, not specifically logging in. "Acesso" or "Entrar" would be more accurate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A legenda do botão utilizado para entrar no espaço com o serviço de Início de Sessão Único

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Início de Sessão Único" is a literal translation of "Single Sign-On," it might be overly technical. A more user-friendly alternative could improve comprehension.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A legenda do botão utilizado para entrar no espaço com o serviço de Autenticação Única

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content describes the button used for Single Sign-On. The Romanian translation, 'Eticheta butonului pentru conectarea la spaţiul cu sistem de autentificare unică (SSO)', literally translates to 'The label of the button for connecting to the space with a single authentication system (SSO)'. While technically correct, it's a bit verbose and doesn't capture the nuance of a tooltip. A more natural phrasing might focus on the action of logging in.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Etichetă pentru autentificare SSO

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The acronym 'SSO' is in parentheses. While including it is good for clarity, the format is not consistently used in Romanian UI/UX translations.  It would be more common to see it without parentheses or with a hyphen.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Etichetă pentru autentificare SSO sau SSO-ul

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Надпись для кнопки, которая используется для входа на портал с помощью сервиса Single Sign-on" is a bit verbose and doesn't quite capture the brevity of the English original. 'Надпись' (caption) is accurate, but the phrasing is awkward. "портал" (portal) isn't explicitly mentioned in the English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Надпись для кнопки входа через Single Sign-On

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English uses the proper noun "Single Sign-On" without translation. The Russian translation should maintain this consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Maintain 'Single Sign-On' in the Russian translation. For example: 'Надпись для кнопки входа через Single Sign-On'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ශ්‍රීර්ෂය' (shreershay) is more accurately translated as 'ලේබල්' (lebaL) or 'අඩවිය' (adawiya) in this context. 'ශ්‍රීර්ෂය' generally refers to a heading or title of a document.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ලේබල්

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The overall phrasing could be more natural in Sinhala. The current translation sounds a bit literal and clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තනි පිවිසුම් සේවාව භාවිතයෙන් අවකාශයට පිවිසෙන බොත්තමේ ලේබල්

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and doesn't flow naturally. 'Popis tlačidla, ktoré sa používa na prihlásenie do priestoru so službou jednotného prihlásenia' is clunky. A more natural translation would be something like 'Text pre tlačidlo na prihlásenie pomocou Single Sign-On.' or 'Popis tlačidla na prihlásenie cez Single Sign-On'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Text pre tlačidlo na prihlásenie pomocou Single Sign-On.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'prijavo' is misspelled. The correct spelling is 'prijava'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: prijava

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ознака дугмета за пријављивање у простор помоћу услуге Single Sign-On' is a literal translation and doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'caption for the button'. A more natural Serbian translation would be something like 'Текст на дугмету за пријаву у простор преко Single Sign-On' or 'Натпис на дугмету за пријаву преко Single Sign-On'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Текст на дугмету за пријаву у простор преко Single Sign-On

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'prijavljivanje' is correctly spelled, but could be slightly more precise. 'Prijava' is more commonly used for 'login'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Prijava

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content describes the caption *for* a button. The Turkish translation focuses on the button's purpose, rather than directly stating it's the button's caption. A more direct translation would be closer to 'The caption of the button used to log in to the space with the Single Sign-On service'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tek Oturum Açma hizmetiyle alana giriş yapmak için kullanılan düğmenin başlığı.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content describes the caption of a button for Single Sign-On login. The Ukrainian translation, while understandable, is a bit too literal. 'Надпис для кнопки, яка використовується для входу до простору за допомогою служби єдиного входу' sounds clunky. A more natural phrasing would focus on the purpose of the button.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Підпис кнопки для входу через єдиний вхід

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content describes the caption for a button used for Single Sign-On. The Vietnamese translation, 'Chú thích cho nút được sử dụng để đăng nhập vào không gian với dịch vụ Đăng nhập một lần,' is a bit too literal and verbose. 'Không gian' (space) isn't the most natural way to describe the area being accessed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Chú thích cho nút đăng nhập bằng dịch vụ Đăng nhập một lần

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Đăng nhập một lần' could be more naturally written as 'Đăng nhập duy nhất' for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Chú thích cho nút đăng nhập bằng dịch vụ Đăng nhập duy nhất

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content describes the caption *for* a button, while the Chinese translation describes the button's *text*. The translation is functionally inaccurate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 用于单点登录服务登录空间的按钮的标题
